title: Discord Music Bot
description: Built a music bot using discord.py, integrating features from YouTube, Spotify, and SoundCloud for music playback. Implemented music streaming commands (play, pause, resume, skip) with queue management, loop modes, and playlist support for YouTube, Spotify, and SoundCloud within Discord servers.

title: Perception
description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly website for Exquisite - The Music Festival using React, TypeScript, and Firebase. The platform serves as a central hub for festival attendees, offering detailed information on artist line-ups, event schedules, ticket registration, and community interaction.

title: Exquisite
description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly website for Exquisite - The Music Festival using React, TypeScript, and Firebase. The platform serves as a central hub for festival attendees, offering detailed information on artist line-ups, event schedules, ticket registration, and community interaction.

title: PlanetPlate
description: Developed PlanetPlate, a food distribution platform that connects restaurants with local NGOs to address food waste and promote sustainable resource use. The platform enables surplus food redistribution and facilitates recycling of by-products for industrial reuse.

title: CUG Management System
description: The Closed User Group Management System is a secure platform developed during an internship at East Coast Railway, designed for railway personnel and stakeholders. It offers exclusive access and advanced security for efficient CUG management.
